detectors.description:
PolkaDOT.buyToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#248-253) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#250)
detectors.markdown:
[PolkaDOT.buyToken()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L248-L253) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L250)
